source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_document_metadata

AS

SELECT DISTINCT 
DataId	                AS	documentId,
CaseNodeId	            AS	caseId,
caseReference	        AS	caseReference,
documentReference	    AS	documentReference,
Version	                AS	version,
'NULL'	                AS	examinationRefNo,
Name	                AS	filename,
Name	                AS	originalFilename,
DataSize	            AS	size,
'NULL'	                AS	mime,
'NULL'	                AS	documentUri,
'NULL'	                AS	publishedDocumentUri,
'NULL'	                AS	virusCheckStatus,
'NULL'	                AS	fileMd5,
CreateDate	            AS	dateCreated,
ModifyDate	            AS	lastModified,
CaseworkType	        AS	caseType,
'NULL'	                AS	redactedStatus,
PublishedStatus	        AS	publishedStatus,
DatePublished	        AS	datePublished,
DocumentType	        AS	documentType,
'NULL'	                AS	securityClassification,
SourceSystem	        AS	sourceSystem,
'NULL'	                AS	origin,
'NULL'	                AS	owner,
Author	                AS	author,
Representative	        AS	representative,
DocumentDescription	    AS	description,
DocumentCaseStage	    AS	documentCaseStage,
Filter1	                AS	filter1,
Filter2	                AS	filter2,
ParentID	            AS	horizonFolderId,
'NULL'	                AS	transcriptId	

FROM odw_harmonised_db.document_meta_data
WHERE IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.document_meta_data

USING delta

AS

SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_document_metadata
